page.shortlink: api objects table object populate from string function
page.description: Populate a table from a string.

argument.name: record_format
argument.description: A (comma) delimited list of field names. The delimiter must match what is used in the data, which is most often a comma.

argument.name: record_sep
argument.description: The character or expression that separates records in the Data field.

argument.name: record_data
argument.description: Data to place into the table.

page.discussion: The <TBL>.POPULATE_FROM_STRING() method populates an existing table from a string variable.
page.example: data = <<%a% tom,23334.56,12/18/52,.t. fred,23412.345,12/10/72,.f. %a% t = table.open("testtable") t.populate_from_string("name,salary,dob,married", crlf(), data) t.close()

section.description: The above example adds two new records to a table called "testtable":
